code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchedCarts=_ref=>{let{Cart}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"drawer__cart searchCart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"drawer__cart-img-block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/img/").concat(Cart.images[0]),className:"drawer__cart-img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"drawer__cart-text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/".concat(Cart.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"drawer__cart-title",children:Cart.name})}),Cart.type.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"drawer__cart-type",children:"\u0427\u0430\u0448\u043A\u0430: ".concat(Cart.type.filter(element=>element.isActive)[0].name)}):null,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"drawer__cart-text-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"drawer__cart-price",children:[Cart.count?Cart.price*Cart.count:Cart.price," \u20B4"]})})]})]});};export default SearchedCarts;
